page.title: 04Hayward's Primary School
page.content: The first part of this school was built in{1890.}The next part was built in{1930.}There are five buildings and two caravans. We have wo playgrounds, a field and three gardens. It is in{Dean Street.}There is also an entrance in{East Street.} School starts at 9.00am and the day finishes at 3.40pm. There are 11 teachers. The{headmaster}is{Mr. {Woodford}and the secretary is Mrs. Martin. There are{318 pupils}aged 4-11. There is a{swimmimg pool}which we use in summer. It is solar-heated. We have a school called{Radio 7 which we broadcast every Friday. We have sport, mobility and lots of other{clubs}which take place during dinner and after school.
